languages.text: {n}Джай перестает улыбаться и утомленно потирает переносицу.{/n} "Послушайте, шерин, податель{mf||ница} счастья и любезней{mf|ший друг|шая подруга моя}... я та, кто я есть — {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торговец{/g}, агент {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллики{/g} и ваш партнер. А прошлое у каждого свое и есть тайна за семью печатями. Я ж не лезу вам в душу, верно? Так и вы мою пожалейте, она и без того уже изрядно ажи потаскана да пожевана. А если вам это не по вкусу, так давайте расходиться — и дальше каждый по своему пути, да?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай перестает улыбаться и утомленно потирает переносицу.{/n} "Послушайте, шерин, податель{mf||ница} счастья и любезней{mf|ший друг|шая подруга моя}... я та, кто я есть – {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Хладный Торговец{/g}, агент {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллики{/g} и ваш партнер. А прошлое у каждого свое и есть тайна за семью печатями. Я ж не лезу вам в душу, верно? Так и вы мою пожалейте, она и без того уже изрядно ажи потаскана да пожевана. А если вам это не по вкусу, так давайте расходиться — и дальше каждый по своему пути, да?"

languages.text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай перестает улыбаться и утомленно потирает переносицу.{/n} "Послушайте, шерин, податель{mf||ница} счастья и любезней{mf|ший друг|шая подруга моя}... я та, кто я есть — {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торговец{/g}, агент {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллики{/g} и ваш партнер. А прошлое у каждого свое и есть тайна за семью печатями. Я ж не лезу вам в душу, верно? Так и вы мою пожалейте, она и без того уже изрядно ажи потаскана да пожевана. А если вам это не по вкусу, так давайте расходиться — и дальше каждый по своему пути, да?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am – a Cold Trader, a Kasballican agent and your partner. Each of us comes with a past, and this past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed on by the daevas. Let's just go our separate ways if you don't like it, shall we?"

{n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am – a Cold Trader, a Kasballican agent and your partner. Each of us comes with a past, and this past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed on by the daevas. Let's just go our separate ways if you don't like it, shall we?"

{n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a Cold Trader, a Kasballican agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed on by the divs. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

{n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed on by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

languages.text: {n}婕伊的笑容消失了，疲惫地揉了揉鼻梁。{/n}“听着，亲爱的，幸福的赐予者，我最亲爱的朋友……我就是我，一位{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市商人{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}的代理人，也是你的伙伴。我们每个人都有自己的过去，而有些过去应该被藏起来。我从来没有打探过你的灵魂，对不对？我也希望你能可怜可怜我的灵魂，它已经被鬼怪啃得不成样子了。如果你不喜欢我这样的态度，我们不如分道扬镳吧，你觉得呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的笑容消失了，疲惫地揉了揉鼻梁。{/n}“听着，亲爱的，幸福的赐予者，我最亲爱的朋友……我就是我，一位{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市商人{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}的代理人，也是你的伙伴。我们每个人都有自己的过去，而有些过去应该被藏起来。我从来没有打探过你的灵魂，对不对？我也希望你能可怜可怜我的灵魂，它已经被鬼怪啃得不成样子了。如果你不喜欢我这样的态度，我们不如分道扬镳吧，你觉得呢？”

languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a Cold Trader, a Kasballican agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed on by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

languages.text: {n}Jae deja de sonreír y se frota la nariz, cansada.{/n} «Escuche, shereen, dador{mf||a} de felicidad y {mf|el|la} mejor de mis amig{mf|o|a}s... Soy quien soy: una {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comerciante Fría{/g}, una agente de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y su compañera. Todos tenemos nuestro pasado y no hay forma de cambiarlo. No indagando en su alma, ¿verdad? Pues tenga piedad con la mía, que ya la han roído los azhi. Y, si no le basta con eso, iremos cada un{mf|o|a} por nuestro lado, ¿de acuerdo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae deja de sonreír y se frota la nariz, cansada.{/n} «Escuche, shereen, dador{mf||a} de felicidad y {mf|el|la} mejor de mis amig{mf|o|a}s... Soy quien soy: una {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comerciante Fría{/g}, una agente de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y su compañera. Todos tenemos nuestro pasado y no hay forma de cambiarlo. No indagando en su alma, ¿verdad? Pues tenga piedad con la mía, que ya la han roído los azhi. Y, si no le basta con eso, iremos cada un{mf|o|a} por nuestro lado, ¿de acuerdo?».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは微笑むのをやめ、疲れたように鼻の下をこすった。{/n}「聞いてよ、幸せの贈り主であり、最も親愛なる友人よ…アタシが何者なのか…あたしは{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷たき取引人{/g}であり、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}のエージェントであり、あんたのパートナーだ。あたしたちにはそれぞれ過去があり、その過去は封印されている。あんたの魂を詮索するつもりはない。あたしの魂はすでにアジーにかじられている。それが嫌なら、別々の道を歩むことにしよう、いい？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは微笑むのをやめ、疲れたように鼻の下をこすった。{/n}「聞いてよ、幸せの贈り主であり、最も親愛なる友人よ…アタシが何者なのか…あたしは{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷たき取引人{/g}であり、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}のエージェントであり、あんたのパートナーだ。あたしたちにはそれぞれ過去があり、その過去は封印されている。あんたの魂を詮索するつもりはない。あたしの魂はすでにアジーにかじられている。それが嫌なら、別々の道を歩むことにしよう、いい？」

languages.text: {n}Jaes Lächeln schwindet und sie reibt sich müde die Nasenwurzel.{/n} "Hört mal, Shereen, {mf|der Ihr mich glücklich macht und mein bester Freund|die Ihr mich glücklich macht und meine beste Freundin} seid ... Ich bin, wer ich bin. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthändlerin{/g}, eine Agentin der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} und Eure Partnerin. Jeder hat eine Vergangenheit, und diese Vergangenheit ist versiegelt. Ich bohre doch auch nicht in Eurer Seele herum, oder etwa doch? Nun, habt Gnade mit der meinen, sie wurde schon von den Azhi angeknabbert. Und wenn Euch das nicht gefällt, gehen wir einfach getrennter Wege, einverstanden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

Ich bin, wer ich bin. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthändlerin{/g}, eine Agentin der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} und Eure Partnerin. Jeder hat eine Vergangenheit, und diese Vergangenheit ist versiegelt. Ich bohre doch auch nicht in Eurer Seele herum, oder etwa doch? Nun, habt Gnade mit der meinen, sie wurde schon von den Azhi angeknabbert. Und wenn Euch das nicht gefällt, gehen wir einfach getrennter Wege, einverstanden?"

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de Jae disparaît et elle se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n} « Écoutez, shereen, ma source de bonheur et {mf|mon plus cher ami|plus chère amie}... Vous savez qui je suis : une adepte du {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g}, une agente de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et votre partenaire. Nous avons chacun notre propre passé, qui est révolu et n'a pas besoin d'être déterré. Je ne cherche pas à savoir ce que vous cachez au plus profond de votre âme, si ? Alors abstenez-vous également par pitié pour la mienne, qui a déjà été rongée par les azhi. Et si ça ne vous plaît pas, nous n'aurons qu'à partir {mf|chacun|chacune} de notre côté. Entendu ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de Jae disparaît et elle se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n} « Écoutez, shereen, ma source de bonheur et {mf|mon plus cher ami|plus chère amie}... Vous savez qui je suis : une adepte du {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g}, une agente de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et votre partenaire. Nous avons chacun notre propre passé, qui est révolu et n'a pas besoin d'être déterré. Je ne cherche pas à savoir ce que vous cachez au plus profond de votre âme, si ? Alors abstenez-vous également par pitié pour la mienne, qui a déjà été rongée par les azhi. Et si ça ne vous plaît pas, nous n'aurons qu'à partir {mf|chacun|chacune} de notre côté. Entendu ? »

languages.text: {n}Jae, gülümsemeyi kesip bezgin bir tavırla burun kemiğini ovuyor.{/n} "Dinle şirinim, mutluluğumun biricik kaynağı, değerli dostum: Ben neysem oyum. {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Tacir'im{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ajanıyım ve senin ortağınım. Hepimizin kilitli bir hücrede saklı birer geçmişi var. Ben senin ruhunun derinliklerine burnumu sokmuyorum, değil mi? Sen de bana acı, azhi zaten başımın etini yeterince yedi. Bu duydukların hoşuna gitmiyorsa da yollarımızı ayırıveririz, olur mu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stops smiling and rubs the bridge of her nose wearily.{/n} "Listen, shereen, the giver of happiness and the dearest of my friends... I am who I am — a {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballican{/g} agent, and your partner. We each have a past, and that past is sealed. I am not prying into your soul, am I? Well, have pity on mine, it has already been gnawed at by the azhi. And if you don't like the sound of that, we'll just go our separate ways, deal?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae gülümsemeyi kesiyor ve bezgin bir tavırla burnunun köprüsünü ovuyor.{/n} "Dinle şirinim, mutluluğumun biricik kaynağı, en değerli dostum: Ben neysem oyum. Bir {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Tacir{/g}'im, bir {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ajanıyım ve senin partnerinim. Hepimizin kendi geçmişi var ve bu geçmiş kilitli bir hücrede. Ben senin ruhunun derinliklerine burnumu sokmuyorum, değil mi? Sen de bana acı, azhi zaten başımın etini yeterince yedi. Bu duydukların hoşuna gitmiyorsa da yollarımızı ayırıveririz, anlaştık mı?"
